[quest]The Solar Factory![/quest]

The structure has §c3§r tiers, each of which allow greater production than the previous tier. 

Recipes in NEI display the minimum wafer tier required. 
Wafer Tiers: 

§6Monocrystalline
Phosphorous
Naquadah
Europium
Americium
Photonically Prepared
Photonically Enhanced

§fMachine parallels are based on Precise Casing Tier: 

§6MK-I: §f8x
§9§6MK-II: §f16x
§6MK-III: §f32x
§6MK-IV: §f64x

§lTier §b2§f:

§aSupports Multi-Amp energy hatches
§c25%§f more outputs for every §m§l§r§l§7§f§k§rWafer§r tier §n§r§oabove §rthe minimum required. 
The bonus to outputs occurs after parallels, but §9cannot be greater§f than §c100%
§fLV-LuV Solar Panels can be made without the previous panel, but at a higher cost.

§lTier §b3§f:

§r§aSupports Laser Energy hatches
§f§c§fBonus per increased wafer tier is increased to §c50%§f
ZPM-UV Solar Panels can be made without the previous panel, but at a higher cost.
